name: Alper Ebicoglu
bio: Full stack .NET developer; Learning, writing, building software on .NET since the early 2000s. Core team member of ABP Framework and ASP.NET Boilerplate web frameworks. Co-founder of https://volosoft.com
tags: .NET, C#, ASP.NET, ABP.IO, Web Development Framework, Clean Architecture, Domain Driven Design

projects.name: ABP Framework
projects.description: ABP Framework is an open-source web application framework built on top of ASP.NET Core. It is a complete infrastructure to create modern web applications by following the best practices and conventions of software development.
